actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To prohibit any increase in the amount of a security deposit paid by a low-income family for rental of a dwelling unit receiving Federal rental housing assistance during the occupancy of the family in the unit.

summary.text: Low-Income Housing Tenants Security Act - Prohibits any additional security deposit increases during the tenancy of a low-income family in a federally-assisted rental unit.

titles.title: To prohibit any increase in the amount of a security deposit paid by a low-income family for rental of a dwelling unit receiving Federal rental housing assistance during the occupancy of the family in the unit.
